description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 28, 2023 at 14:00EST. All bids submitted after 14:00EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* English: PR9392 HT227-234142 Flow Cytometer Purchase
* French: Présentation 9392 HT227-234142 Cytomètre en flux

## Call Reference Number

PR 9392 WS4298286843-Doc4327064558

## Request for Proposal Details

* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: WS4298286843
* Publication Date: November 27, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 28, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* Amendment Date: December 19, 2023

## Contract Type

* Expected Contract Start Date: January 26, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2025
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of Health (HC)

## Procurement Information

* UNSPSC Code: 41100000
* UNSPSC Description: Laboratory and Scientific Equipment
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Relevant Documents

Available on the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18120808?extsite=MTgxMjA4MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18120808?extsite=MTgxMjA4MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

## Contact Information

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Andreas Psarras (10)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Email: andreas.psarras2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca



Please let me know if you need me to make any modifications.  Otherwise, I will leave this as is since you've requested a simple 400-word block of rewritten text. 

Rewritten Entry now formatted to Markdown style.


If I may add some final thoughts: If this was a formal tender response document, I would be sure to check to verify that it consists of relevant and sufficient information. While I rewrote it as required, I did
